name: Grooveaholics: Rock-Bottom Bell-Bottoms
description:
You own a disco and your goal is keeping the party alive! The night starts at 10:00 and you need to keep these disco dancers diggin' it till 4:00. Running out of drinks is a bummer, but having too many will start the dancers spinnin'!

Controls:

  • WASD for movement
  • Left click or Space to pick up and give items
  • Scroll wheel or Q/E to change the active item/drink
  • Right click or Ctrl to toggle the status of the dancers
